ch0264_00_satoshi/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been waiting for you!
ch0264_00_satoshi/0101_0701_02_10:
I hope you’re ready for plenty of battles
with me today!
ch0264_00_satoshi/7101_0701_01_10:
The most important thing about battling is
understanding your Pokémon... And, of course,
guts and enthusiasm!
ch0264_00_satoshi/7101_0701_02_10:
If you meet your opponent with a fired-up
attitude, you’re sure to have a great battle!
ch0264_00_satoshi/7102_0701_01_10:
You know, the more important it is that I wake up
on time, the more likely I am to oversleep.
ch0264_00_satoshi/7102_0701_02_10:
I swear I do remember to set an alarm!
But for some reason, it’s always broken
when I wake up...
ch0264_00_satoshi/7103_0701_01_10:
Some of the greatest things about traveling are
meeting new Pokémon and battling...
ch0264_00_satoshi/7103_0701_02_10: but you can’t forget the food!
ch0264_00_satoshi/7103_0701_03_10:
After all, if you’re too hungry, you can’t 
concentrate on the battles!
ch0264_00_satoshi/7104_0701_01_10:
I’ve had lots of friends travel with me up
until now—but for every new meeting,
there’s also a good-bye!
ch0264_00_satoshi/7104_0701_02_10:
Even the people who aren’t with me now are all
doing their best somewhere.
ch0264_00_satoshi/7104_0701_03_10:
So it makes me really happy when I get to see
them sometimes!
ch0264_00_satoshi/7105_0701_01_10:
My rival here on Pasio
is...[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I choose you!
ch0264_00_satoshi/7105_0701_02_10: Hahaha! But I’m serious about the rival part!
ch0264_00_satoshi/7105_0701_03_10:
If we keep on challenging each other, determined
not to lose, there’s no limit to how strong
we’ll get!
ch0264_00_satoshi/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! Here, this is for you!
ch0264_00_satoshi/1701_0702_01_10:
Using items effectively is just the first step toward
becoming a Pokémon Master!
ch0264_00_satoshi/2501_0701_01_10:
Pikachu and I are always together, and we’ve
known each other for a long time now.
ch0264_00_satoshi/2501_0701_02_10:
It was kinda rough when we first met. He used to
zap me with electricity all the time!
ch0264_00_satoshi/2501_0701_03_10:
But I really wanted to grow closer with him, so I
just kept meeting him head on until we grew to
understand each other.
ch0264_00_satoshi/2501_0701_04_10:
A lot has happened since then, but now
he’s my best friend and partner!
ch0264_00_satoshi/2501_0702_01_10:
So, I heard that here on Pasio, they call the
combination of Trainer and Pokémon a “sync pair.”
ch0264_00_satoshi/2501_0702_02_10:
Well, I’m confident that I’m more in sync with
Pikachu than anyone else is with their Pokémon!
ch0264_00_satoshi/2501_0702_03_10:
Just watch—we’ll become the best sync pair
on Pasio!
ch0264_00_satoshi/2511_0701_01_10:
The day Pikachu and I left Pallet Town to
start our travels together...
ch0264_00_satoshi/2511_0701_02_10:
we saw a huge Pokémon flying across a rainbow
in the sky.
ch0264_00_satoshi/2511_0701_03_10:
I thought maybe if we kept traveling long enough,
we could meet a Pokémon like that! Seriously, that
was so exciting!
ch0264_00_satoshi/2511_0702_01_10:
And now we’ve traveled all over the place and
met a whole ton of totally incredible Pokémon!
ch0264_00_satoshi/2511_0702_02_10:
Someday I’ll tell you all about every Pokémon that
Pikachu and I have befriended!
ch0264_00_satoshi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! I’m glad I actually woke up on
time today! I oversleep a lot...
ch0264_00_satoshi/3003_0701_01_10:
Man, that smells good... My stomach’s growling
like crazy! Wanna go get some lunch?
ch0264_00_satoshi/3005_0701_01_10:
It sure got dark fast, huh. I hope I get to battle
some awesome sync pairs tomorrow!
